DOC.brief_summary: Comparing the efficacy of cold biopsy forceps versus cold snare biopsy for removing colon polyps.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Cold Biopsy Forceps Versus Cold Snare Biopsy for Colon Polyps
DOC.detailed_description: Polyps were randomized to be treated with either CSP or CFP. After the initial polypectomy, additional EMR was performed at the polypectomy site to assess the presence of residual polyp tissue.
DOC.criteria: patients older than 40 years old and patients who are receiving colonoscopies and patients who have colon polyps patients who have not agreed to the study patients with bleeding tendencies
